translation: 1. Yalli xiibiteh Tiin kee Zaytuun deqsitta namma caxal.
2. Kaadu qaley Tuuri siina deqsittal xiibite.
3. Kaadu a baaxoy saay lei xiibite. (Макка kinnuk)

arabic_text: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمٖ

translation: 5. Wohuk lakal usuk yallih amri oggole weeh, kay farmoytit kataate week girak gubi gubah kaa gacsenno.

arabic_text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ
translation: 6. Takkay ikkal, yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abbaasite mari, aggiriqqe wayta galtó le akeeral.
7. Tokkel tahak wadir seehadaytow galtóh ayróh (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) dirabboysiyyat maca koo bahtaah?
8. Yalli mekla abba haytaamak meklah yaysi hinnaa? Yeey, kinnih.
